Text.Page: <PCNAME> flew over Arx Umbra and assaulted Parthian Outpost Alpha. After the battle, the truth about how the archdevas enslaved the Parthians came out.

Finally! Something I'm good at. I can fly the airship and you can jump from it.
"Jump from what?"

Don't worry. I'll stay low enough the fall doesn't hurt too much.

Come! We'll get to Zolyn no matter how much it hurts you!

When you're in the middle of the enemy formations, drop down.

May Kaia grant you victory!

, come here, quick!

He's still alive! And he's trying to say something!
Road? What road? Oh! Rhodos! He's looking for Rhodos!"I'll talk to him."

Mind…clear. Tell Rhodos…

We're not servants of the archdevas; we're slaves."What do you mean?"

Their magic…it twisted our minds. Bound us to them.

Tell Rhodos to free us…and avenge me."Be at peace."
Well fought, <PCNAME>! You got through!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"I was asked to give this to you."</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

It's Jitt's dagger!
Where did you get this? Where is he?
